Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiMovieAni/UiMovieActivityAniBg01.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{2: 'Game Narration', 3: 'Humans. Drawn always by the beach. All too human.'}
{2: 'Game Narration', 3: 'Dazzling summer sun, and blue skies... the beach is absolutely the best place to spend a summer vacation.'}

{2: 'Game Narration', 3: "You might not be able to go to the beach for a vacation for various reasons, and can't meet your friends from other places, so for those of you with these problems, we have the best holiday plan for you!"}
{2: 'Game Narration', 3: 'An immersive summer beach story! Spend an unforgettable vacation with your closest!'}
{3: 'Overly upbeat music plays in the background. Lee firmly turns down the volume of the game.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{3: 'The first thing that appears is a page full of various clothing.'}
{2: 'Game Narration', 3: '[Select the clothing you want to play in]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's the usual avatar-making stuff before entering a game! We have our appearance data already, so we just have to choose our clothes.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '17', 4: "These are all swimsuits, aren't they?", 5: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "They're all... swimsuits.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm starting to regret being a part of this.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "But why? We Constructs don't normally get to wear clothes like these.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv looks a little ill at ease when she sees the rows and rows of various swimsuits.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I haven't ever picked outfits other than combat coating... Do you have any recommendations, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Try a bold and daring swimsuit', 3: '29', 4: 'Try a blue school-designated swimsuit', 5: '31', 6: 'Choose something you like', 7: '34'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh...? Eh? Y-you want me to wear this...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee looks over with a gaze that must have burnt through your VR goggles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, I never knew you had such... tendencies. I've learned something new about you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'J-just kidding. Liv, choose something you like.', 3: '34'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah... Then I'll pick this one.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After thinking it over, Liv chooses a black and white swimsuit. Her avatar changes into a swimsuit-wearing one, with a black and white fishtail unfolding behind her.'}
{2: 'It suits you, Liv.', 3: '40', 4: 'You look like the daughter of the ocean, like from that story.', 5: '40'}
{3: 'Lee, in contrast, quickly skims through the selection and confirms immediately after selecting a swimsuit.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hey! You made your choice so quickly! I didn't even get to see the other clothes!"}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "There's no need to consider water pressure and resistance when it's all virtual, so the swimwear doesn't matter. Also, didn't you play this before? You should've seen all the clothes already.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I only played a little bit of it. And character creation is part of the fun too!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't get it at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So what should I pick? Commandant, help me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Swimming briefs', 3: '54', 4: 'Hawaiian pineapple swimming trunks', 5: '58', 6: 'Rubber ducky swimming trunks', 7: '60'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...You think this suits me, Commandant? Well, I guess it's easier to move around with less fabric...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Uh... This is a little... Kamui, you might want to try another one...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh yeah! This is nice! Feels just like a vacation!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If you wear that in the game, I'm leaving right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'This feels kinda weird... Is this duck bill even detachable?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Stop messing with him, Commandant. He'll take it seriously.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hmm... They all look so fun to wear, though. Which should I choose?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I recommend none of them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'It looks like... The swimsuit Lee chose earlier is one of the more normal-looking ones...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui frowns and scrolls through the selection list, then suddenly slaps his thigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Forget it! Clothes don't matter! We don't always get to play together, so let's not waste precious time!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Kamui exits the clothing catalog and enters the game with his default avatar.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Well, I've tried all of 'em on when I was playing by myself anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh! Let's see... We can play beach volleyball and have matches! Teams of two!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "To make it fair, let's play rock-paper-scissors! Winners one team, losers the other.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I know you guys will all want to be on Commandant's team if I let you choose.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't assume that everyone's like you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant, let's go first. Rock, paper, scissors—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui plays rock!'}
{3: 'Kamui plays scissors!'}
{3: 'Kamui plays paper!'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Huh? A tie? No way! Again! Rock, paper, scissors—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui plays rock!'}
{3: 'Kamui plays scissors!'}
{3: 'Kamui plays paper!'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "A tie again! Commandant, we are so in sync! Let's just be on the same team!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Should have just done this from the beginning...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Then Lee will be teaming up with me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Since we've decided on our teams, let's get started!", 4: '1'}
